Entries.Mon8: I'm eager to move out. It's really grim, living in my Mom's old house.#$e#It has some good memories in it... but I can't stay here forever... you know?$s
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for Pierre's shop. Mom always loved JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she could afford a lot more there than she ever could at Pierre's.|Mom would be really mad to find out that JojaMart closed down. She'd have to cut down on her Joja Cola.
Entries.fall_Thu6: Mom never took very good care of herself...$u#$e#Could I have done more?$u

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I wonder if... wait, what was I about to say? I can't remember.$s

Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Ah... in weather like this, mom would usually be at the saloon.$s#$b#Shame she never kicked that habit... oh well.$s
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: My old place is probably really lonely without me or mom there...$s#$e#Does it... make sense to say that a house can be lonely? Or maybe... hungry...$s
